Sentencas: In this study, the Cu0.5Ni0.5MnCoO4 (CNMC) material was developed for use in the cathode of solid oxide fuel cells (SOFC).
Titulo: Research on the novel spinel structure of Cu0.5Ni0.5MnCoO4 and its application in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: X-ray diffraction (XRD) confirmed the spinel structure and demonstrated compatibility with Yttriastabilized zirconia (YSZ) electrolyte at elevated temperatures.
Titulo: Research on the novel spinel structure of Cu0.5Ni0.5MnCoO4 and its application in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The conductivity of CNMC was found to be between 28 and 55 S cm-1 at temperatures ranging from 700 to 900 degrees C. Oxygen-temperature programmed desorption (O2-TPD) revealed that CNMC powder possesses effective oxygen catalytic characteristics.
Titulo: Research on the novel spinel structure of Cu0.5Ni0.5MnCoO4 and its application in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: To enhance performance, CNMC was combined with Gd0.1Ce0.9O2-delta (GDC, H2-bank Co. Ltd.) in a mass ratio of 3:7 (CG37).
Titulo: Research on the novel spinel structure of Cu0.5Ni0.5MnCoO4 and its application in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The thermal expansion coefficient (TEC) of this composite was measured at 12.8 x 10-6 K-1, closely matching that of YSZ and avoiding the issue of strontium segregation, eliminating the need for a barrier layer between the electrolyte and the cathode.
Titulo: Research on the novel spinel structure of Cu0.5Ni0.5MnCoO4 and its application in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The peak power densities of CG37 reached 1175 mW cm-2 and 905 mW cm-2 at 800 degrees C and 750 degrees C, respectively.
Titulo: Research on the novel spinel structure of Cu0.5Ni0.5MnCoO4 and its application in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: CG37 underwent testing for 1000 h under constant-current discharge at 600 mA cm-2 and 750 degrees C, showing a voltage degradation rate of 2.5 %/kh.
Titulo: Research on the novel spinel structure of Cu0.5Ni0.5MnCoO4 and its application in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The cell's microstructure remained intact without any signs of elemental diffusion or segregation, indicating excellent chemical compatibility and stable structural integrity.
Titulo: Research on the novel spinel structure of Cu0.5Ni0.5MnCoO4 and its application in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: This research is expected to further advance the study and utilization of novel solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Research on the novel spinel structure of Cu0.5Ni0.5MnCoO4 and its application in solid oxide fuel cells
